thread.title: NSA chief warns cyberthreats persist despite China accord
thread.title_full: NSA chief warns cyberthreats persist despite China accord

title: NSA chief warns cyberthreats persist despite China accord
text:
28 NSA chief warns cyberthreats persist despite China accord 
Networkworld: On the eve of a significant agreement between the United States and China on trade and information security, the head of the National Security Agency cautioned that the two superpowers must develop a set of norms that would curb cyber-espionage and theft of intellectual property from U.S. firms.
